‚Ä¢Use	LSTM	optimizer	which	operates	coordinate-wise	on	the	parameters
‚Ä¢By	considering	coordinate-wise	optimizer‚Ä¢Able	to	use	small	network	for	optimizer‚Ä¢Share	optimizer	parameters	across	different	parameters	of	the	model‚Ä¢Input:	gradient	for	single	coordinate	and	the	hidden	state‚Ä¢Output:	update	for	corresponding	model	parameter

An	Extension:	Hierarchical	RNN	Optimizer
48
TensorRNNand	GlobalRNNallowParameterRNNsto	have	few	hidden	units
TensorRNNaggregates	local	informationfrom	a	subset	of	ParameterRNNs
GlobalRNNaggregates	global	informationfrom	all	of	TensorRNNs

‚Ä¢Learning	model	initialization‚Ä¢Learning	initializationthat	transfer	well	with	small	number	of	samples
‚Ä¢Learning	optimizers‚Ä¢Optimize	the	problem	faster	and	better‚Ä¢In	the	distribution	of	the	problem	that	optimizers	are	meta-trained
